title: Roasted Red Pepper Houmous
ingredients: ['1 (400g) tin chickpeas, rinsed and drained', '1-2 cloves garlic, peeled', '100g roasted red pepper from a jar', '3 tablespoons tahini (sesame paste)', '1 tablespoon lemon juice', '1 tablespoon olive oil', 'smoked paprika to taste', 'salt and pepper to taste', 'crushed chilli flakes to taste']
